change.item: This finding aid was updated in alignment with LC EAD 2.0 specifications using a python script created by Erik Radio.

did.head: Collection Summary
did.abstract: Correspondence, notes, typescript of interview, and typescript of McCarthy's autobiography chiefly relating McCarthy's experiences as a Tohono O'Odham on the reservation, at Indian schools, service in World War I, and later life. Correspondence, between Westover and others, mostly concerns publication of the book.

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: Collection Relating to James McCarthy (AZ 533). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is organized into 3 series; chronological arrangement within series.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Correspondence, notes, typescript of interview, and typescript of McCarthy's autobiography chiefly relating McCarthy's experiences as a Tohono O'Odham on the reservation, at Indian schools, service in World War I, and later life. Correspondence, between Westover and others, mostly concerns publication of the book.

relatedmaterial.p: Published as A Papago Traveler: The Memories of James McCarthy, by James McCarthy, Sun Tracks and University of Arizona Press, 1985.
Related materials may be found at: AZ 534.
